Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpertGame
public class Game extends Object
This class contains the majority of the game's elements and logic.

    HashMap<String,String>
    calculateInfluence(Island island)
    Method calculateInfluence calculate the player with the highest influence on the given island If two or more players have the highest influence, then only one of them is returned, together with the isDraw flag which tells to the Controller who called the calculateInfluence method if the outcome of the calculation was a draw or not.
    protected HashMap<String,String>
    calculateIslandOwner(Island island, HashMap<String,Integer> influences)
    Method that calculates the Owner of an island according to his influence on that island If there is a draw of influence there's no change about the island's owner

  • Method Details

    • addPlayers

      public void addPlayers(ArrayList<String> playersNames)
      This method add new players to the game.
      Parameters:
      playersNames - : names of the players which have been admitted to the game.

    • instantiateGameElements

      public void instantiateGameElements(ArrayList<String> playersNames)
      This method instantiates all the game elements (clouds,teachers,basket,islands and boards).

    • initiatePlayersLobbies

      public void initiatePlayersLobbies()
      Method initiatePlayersLobbies calculates the number of students to put in the players' lobby and makes the move.

    • fillIslands

      public void fillIslands()
      Method responsible for the filling of the islands' students spots at the beginning of the game. Each student tile is randomly picked by the basket, which in this case only contains 2 tiles for each color. Nor mother nature's island neither the opposite one will receive any student.

    • giveAssistantDeck

      public void giveAssistantDeck(String playerName, int deckId)
      Method giveAssistantDeck assigns the deck of 10 assistant cards to the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - : name of the player, used as the index for the players arrayList
      deckId - : id given to the deck, the player uses it communicate which deck he wants

    • playAssistantCard

      public int playAssistantCard(String nickname, int cardPriority)
      Method playAssistantCard removes the card to the player's deck and adds it to the current turn played assistant cards in order to calculate the playing order for the action phase.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name of the player trying to play the card.
      cardPriority - : priority of the card in play.
      Returns:
      the priority of the played card if the selection is legal, -1 otherwise.

    • getActionPhasePlayerOrder

      public ArrayList<String> getActionPhasePlayerOrder()
      Method getActionPhasePlayerOrder returns the players' order for action according to the chosen Assistant cards.
      Returns:
      the list of players ordered according to their action priority.

    • isCardPlayable

      protected boolean isCardPlayable(Assistant playedCard, ArrayList<Assistant> playerDeck)
      Method isCardPlayable checks if a card can be played or not in the current turn. If it's the only card the player has or every other card in the player deck has already been played by someone else, or the played card is different from the ones played by the other players then return true otherwise, if the played card has already been played but the player has in its deck other cards, different from the ones already played return false
      Parameters:
      playedCard - : the card played by the player
      playerDeck - : the deck of the player

    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(String nickname, int numSteps)
      Method moveMotherNature checks if the player with Player ID can move Mother Nature of numSteps and if it's doable, moves Mother Nature from the current island to the new one.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name of the player making the move.
      numSteps - : number of islands that the player identified with the playerId wants to move mother nature

    • moveStudentsFromLobby

      public boolean moveStudentsFromLobby(String nickname, ArrayList<Integer> studentIDs, ArrayList<Integer> islandIDs)
      Method moveStudentFromLobby checks if the player with Player ID can move the student in his lobby to an island or the corresponding table. If it's doable the student is moved from the lobby to the table/island. If the island id is -1 (ISLAND_ID_NOT_RECEIVED) the student is moved to the table. Otherwise, the student is moved to the island
      Parameters:
      nickname - : id given to the player, used as the index for the players ArrayList
      studentIDs - : number of islands that the player identified with the playerId wants to move mother nature
      islandIDs - : the id of the destination island (or -1 if no island is specified)

    • moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable

      protected void moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable(Player player, Color studentToMove)
      Method moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable moves the selected student tile to the selected Player's board table.
      Parameters:
      player - : Player instance of the player who is adding a student tile to his board table.
      studentToMove - : student tile being moved to the board's table.

    • updateTeachersOwnership

      public void updateTeachersOwnership(String nickname)
      Method updateTeachersOwnership recalculates the given player's number of students and possibly assigns him 1+ teachers ownership
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name of the player of whom we want to check teachers' ownership

    • moveStudentsToLobby

      public boolean moveStudentsToLobby(String playerName, int cloudId)
      Method moveStudentsToLobby moves all the students on a given cloud, to the given player lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerName - : name of to the player making the movement.
      cloudId - : id given to the cloud to empty.

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Utility method used to check whether it's the game's last round or not.
      Returns:
      true if the game will be over at the end of the current round, false if not.

    • isMoveMNLegal

      public boolean isMoveMNLegal(String nickname, int numSteps)
      Method isMoveMNLegal checks if the player with Player ID can move Mother Nature of numSteps
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name given to the player, .. TO DO
      numSteps - : number of islands that the player identified with the playerId wants to move mother nature

    • isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegal

      public boolean isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegal(Player player, int studentIndex, int islandId, ArrayList<Color> studentsToBeAdded)
      Method isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegal checks if the player can move the student in his lobby to an island or the corresponding table.
      Parameters:
      player - : player making the move.
      studentIndex - : index of the student in the board's lobby.
      islandId - : id of the destination island (or -1 if no island is specified)
      studentsToBeAdded - : students whose move has already been validated.

    • isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal

      public boolean isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal(Player player, int cloudId)
      Method isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal checks if the given cloudId identifies a cloud which contains students
      Parameters:
      player - : reference of the player who wants to perform the
      cloudId - : id given to the cloud to empty
      Returns:
      true if the students can be moved from the cloud tile to the player's board's lobby.

    • refillClouds

      public void refillClouds()
      Method refillClouds refills all the clouds in the clouds ArrayList. It's responsible for checking whether a picked student is null, in which case it sets lastRound flag to true.

    • calculateInfluence

      public HashMap<String,String> calculateInfluence(Island island)
      Method calculateInfluence calculate the player with the highest influence on the given island If two or more players have the highest influence, then only one of them is returned, together with the isDraw flag which tells to the Controller who called the calculateInfluence method if the outcome of the calculation was a draw or not.
      Parameters:
      island - : reference of the island on which the influence is calculated

    • mergeIslands

      protected void mergeIslands(Island island)
      Method responsible for the merging of two islands. Two islands are merged when they are close and they have the same owner.
      Parameters:
      island - : reference of the island that has to be merged

    • calculateIslandOwner

      protected HashMap<String,String> calculateIslandOwner(Island island, HashMap<String,Integer> influences)
      Method that calculates the Owner of an island according to his influence on that island If there is a draw of influence there's no change about the island's owner
      Parameters:
      island - : reference to the island on I want to calculate influence
      influences - : map of the calculated influences for each player on that island
      Returns:
      Hashmap that contains the information about a possible draw about the influence and the PlayerID of the Owner

    • changeIslandOwnership

      protected void changeIslandOwnership(Island island, Player newOwner)

    • calculateStudentsInfluences

      protected HashMap<String,Integer> calculateStudentsInfluences(Island island, ArrayList<Player> players)
      Method that calculates the influence of each player on an island
      Parameters:
      island - : instance of the island on which I want to calculate influence
      players - : list of all the players of the game
      Returns:

    • getTowersOwnerName

      protected String getTowersOwnerName(Island island, ArrayList<Player> players)
      Method that returns the PlayerID of the player that are of the team corresponding to the color of the towers on the island. If the team of the player and the tower color on the island it's not the same it returns -1
      Parameters:
      island - : reference of the island of which I want to know the OwnerID
      players - : list of all the players of the game
      Returns:
      nickname of the owner of the island or -1 if there's not an owner

    • setLastRound

      public void setLastRound(boolean lastRound)
      Method lastRound sets the relative boolean flag to true or false, according to the game's state.
      Parameters:
      lastRound - : flag representative of the satisfaction of gameover's conditions.

    • checkGameOver

      public boolean checkGameOver()
      Method that checks if the Game is ended
      Returns:
      true if the game current game is over, false otherwise

    • calculateWinner

      public void calculateWinner()
      Method calculateWinner checks and, if present, sets the winner name by counting each player's number of towers and teacher tiles. If a tie is reached winner is set to null.

    • getPlayerByName

      public Player getPlayerByName(String name)
      Method that returns the instance of a Player based on his nickname
      Parameters:
      name - : nickname of a Player
      Returns:
      instance of the Player corresponding to the given nickname

      Method that returns the instance of the winner
      Returns:
      instance of the Winner

    • getTeachersOwners

      public HashMap<Color,Player> getTeachersOwners()
      Method that returns a Map that identifies the player that is the owner of a given color teacher
      Returns:
      map that associates at every color the owner of its corresponding teacher
